data.text: Exceptional and remarkable experience in everything in this amazing boutique hotel in the heart of the old city! The hospitality was amazing, providing an excellent service in everything I needed for my stay. The breakfast was so delicious, well prepared with the best quality and  with a big variety of options, made up by local products! The location was very convenient, located right in the heart of the medieval city in a beautiful and quiet area, but at the same time right by all the busy parts of the city. The hotel’s architecture and aesthetics is amazing, arts and photography, unique furniture and all the equipment to make my stay very comfortable and pleasurable! My stay was unforgettable! Truly recommended and looking forward to returning very soon. Thank you very much Kasseris family and staff for making my stay unforgettable and providing this exceptional hospitality and experience for my stay in Rhodes.
data.title: Exceptional and amazing experience in Rhodes

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear agapi2sc,
Thank you for your 5 star review and score!
Reading all of those nice words about our hotel, our staff and our services pleases us to a great extent. Our main reward through the accommodation of our guests is their own enjoyment, so we feel honoured to know we’ve achieved our goal once more. After all, bringing only the best to our guests was, is and will be our top priority.
We hope your next stay with us will be just as memorable, if not more!
Our warmest regards,
The “In Camera” team
owner_response.author: Marios Martakis

data.text: We stayed for a week at In Camera and absolutely loved it. Everything about this hotel was excellent, including the friendly staff, delicious breakfast buffet, comfortable accommodations, and location in the Old Town. Our suite was “Forms of Light”, which we highly recommend because of its large private terrace with fantastic views (as long as you don’t mind climbing 3 flights of stairs). We also had the pleasure of meeting the owner, Nikos, who showed us some of his beautiful photos taken on the island.  We would definitely stay at this hotel again if we return to the island!
data.title: Wonderful boutique hotel in the Old Town

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Alice W,
Thank you for your 5 star review and score!
We are so glad your week at our hotel was most pleasing! Our Master Suite “Forms of Light” is one of our best-selling suites, so we’re happy to know you enjoyed some of its merits, like the private terrace and views of the Old City. Mr. Nikos, the rest of the Kasseris family and all of the staff would like to send their heartfelt regards.
Hope to accommodate you again soon!
Warm regards,
The “In Camera” team
owner_response.author: Marios Martakis

data.text: It looks very cute inside, goes right with the “Medieval meets Modern” theme by utilizing the existing Medieval buildings and including modern furniture and decor. The hosts, Marios and George, were amazing. A lot of attention to detail, always offered their help. The included breakfast was a beautiful spread too and yummy. The rooms, the decor and overall the staff and the cook (Vaso) were top notch type of people. They will win you over with their charm :)
data.title: Great place :)

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Dorianarke, 
Thank you for writting this review. Paying attention to details is one of our targets which has as a result satisfied guests like you. We hope to welcome you back in the future and enjoy our hospitality once again.
Kind regards,
the "In Camera" team
owner_response.author: Marios Martakis

data.text:
We stayed in this wonderful hotel for 5 nights and found it truly outstanding. The motto at the entrace says "come as guest, leave as friend" and this exactly summarizes our experience.
This is a very special place with 10 individually styled rooms that are built around historic foundations.
We stayed in a Superior Double Room (called "A Travel into the Light") and found this to be very nice. It is spacious with the  window overlooking an ancient site.
The breakfast served on an elevated terrace overlooking the twon was outstanding and individually prepared each day with slightly different dishes. You could see and taste that the lady preparing the breakfast really loved her job, she was wonderful!
The hotel has a small courtyard with a small hot pool which was ideal for us.
Everybody at the hotel was incredibly friendly and professional and went out of their way to help and explain.
Without any doubt, we will choose this hotel again when we come back to Rhodes.
data.title: A truly wonderful and unique place, highly recommended!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Bierundchili,
Thank you for your 5 star review and score!
We are so glad the hotel and its facilities met your expectations! Our rooms are unique and one of a kind, so the Kasseris family ensured each and every one of them was carefully and masterfully constructed and designed. If you were impressed by our Superior Double Room, then you will most certainly enjoy the rest of our suites during your next stay!
Vaso, the breakfast cook, was happy to get to know you during the mornings. Indeed, her culinary skills are exceptional, because she prepares everything with love and care in mind (as you precisely noted). The rest of the staff was also glad to accommodate you those 5 nights and they send their respective regards.
Overall, we are proud and happy to know we’ve made new friends and we are looking forward to welcome you back in Rhodes!
Warm regards,
The “In Camera” team
owner_response.author: Marios Martakis

data.text:
We loved the location of this hotel.  In Camera is right in the old city and perfectly situated for exploring the town.  There are all sorts of restaurants within two hundred yards and nothing is very far.  Our rooom was spacious and well appointed.  Marios, the manager, was very efficient, helpful and really on top of things.  He organized our pick up and airport taxi and everything went well.  George is charming and helpful and Vaso wonderfully upbeat and hard working at breakfast.  

The bed was comfortable but advertised as a king size whilst in Canada it was certainly just a queen but that is a minor complaint.  Overall an excellent experience and we would definitely recommend this hotel.
data.title: Excellent hotel.

user_location.name: Victoria, Victoria Capital Regional District, Vancouver Island, British Columbia

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear jongage,
Thank you for your 5 star review and score!
We are happy to know that your stay with us was pleasant! We appreciate the nice, individual comments regarding our staff, as well as appreciating the hotel’s convenient location in the heart of the Old City. Indeed, the owners made a great choice when selecting this area of the city for the hotel to be built and seeing that our guests agree pleases us.
Just a small clarification about the bed size, we would like to inform you that all in all of our suites we have COCOMAT beds and mattresses. We follow the EU bed sizing and the EU-King is 160X200cm 63”X79 so officially all of our beds and mattresses are King size. 
Looking forward to welcome you back in the future!
Warm regards,
The “In Camera” team
owner_response.author: Marios Martakis
